events.title: La Tamborrada
events.description: La Tamborrada is an annual drum festival celebrated in San Sebastián, where thousands of participants dressed as soldiers and cooks march through the streets playing drums for 24 hours to honor the city's patron saint, Saint Sebastian.

events.title: Up-Helly-Aa Fire Festival
events.description: A Viking-inspired fire festival featuring a torchlit procession and the burning of a replica longship.

events.title: Standard Chartered Hong Kong Marathon
events.description: Today, the Standard Chartered Hong Kong Marathon brings thousands of runners and spectators to the streets of Hong Kong, with events in marathon, half-marathon, 10 km, and wheelchair categories.

events.title: Royal Langkawi International Regatta
events.description: The 22nd Royal Langkawi International Regatta, an international sailing competition featuring competitive yacht racing across multiple classes, takes place from 19th to 24th January 2026 at the Royal Langkawi Yacht Club in Kuah, drawing sailors from around the world.
